title: Medieval guilds
creator_credit: Milan Herzog and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Discusses the growth of medieval towns and the development, functioning and gradual decay of the guilds. Describes a shoemaker’s shop, showing the activities of the master craftsman, the apprentices, and the journeymen. Filmed in the old guild towns of France, Switzerland and Belgium.
